txt.en: 'According to Kambi, the chieftain said to go through the broken wall above the eastern stairs. We must see if this goblin-tribe does, in fact, lurk in the shadows. I also want to know more about this voice the chieftain was so fearful of.\n\n'Head to the east through the crack and locate the tribe.'
'By Durin's beard! Someone has come to help me! I was cut off from the rest of my group venturing forward through this area, and I found myself here....'
'Before we do anything else, we must first find that goblin-tribe. According to Kambi it should be found through the broken wall above the eastern stairs.'
Kambi, wounded by a goblin near Durin's Threshold, spoke of the ramblings of his attacker. Túbi Thickfist wants this tribe's camp found as soon as possible.
You have discovered the goblin-encampment. A deep, gruff voice barks sharp orders.
The goblin-camp can be found through a crack in the wall above the eastern stair.\n\nTúbi Thickfist has asked you to locate the goblin-camp.
Speak with the dwarf near the goblin camp of Snaga-maudhûl
Jarmárr is near the goblin camp of Snaga-maudhûl.\n\nYou have located the goblin-tribe and heard the voice the chieftain spoke of. You should speak with the dwarf near the road.
